Original:
茶類都非常好喝，老闆跟老闆娘人超熱情大方！
茶啤酒很讚，有特色。
茶拿鐵可以問問看能不能半糖，有時候喝起來太甜哈哈哈，但茶香味超濃！

招牌菜 麵包 熱狗炒飯 骰子牛 雞翅 茶凍都很好吃
麵包的大蒜香很夠味，熱狗脆脆的超好吃
骰子牛給超多洋蔥超讚🤤

雞翅微辣，但烤的酥酥脆脆的，香辣香辣的很配酒！🤩
茶凍是配檸檬汁，要能接受酸的再點哦！

整體而言超級推薦！！
EN:
Tea are very delicious, the boss and the boss are super enthusiastic!
Tea beer is very good and characteristic.
Tea latte can ask if it can be semi -sugar, sometimes it is too sweet to drink hahaha, but the tea flavor is super strong!

Signature dishes, bread dog fried rice fried rice dice, chicken wings tea frozen is delicious
The garlic of the bread is delicious enough, the hot dog is crispy and delicious
Dice beef gives too much onion

Chicken wings are slightly spicy, but the grilled crispy and crispy, spicy and spicy are very good at wine!Bleak
Tea frozen is a lemon juice, and you can accept the sour!

Overall, it is super recommended!Intersection

Original:
溫馨的小酒館，板娘親切，老板用心，餐點精心，也很注重服務的細節，尤其五星級的洗手間，清潔程度令人驚驗！

推薦德式香腸，雞胸套餐，配人參茶或梅酒，百香冰酒，風味絕佳，高貴不貴！
EN:
The warm tavern, Ban Niang is kind, the boss is attentive, the meals are carefully, and the details of the service are also focused on the service. Especially the five -star toilet, the degree of cleaning is amazing!

Recommended German sausage, chicken breast set, partner ginseng tea or plum wine, Baixiang ice wine, excellent flavor, noble and not expensive!

Original: 乾淨整潔明亮衛生，老板很親切。產品多元化，咖啡、酒、茶都很棒，平價且CP值高。還提供簡餐、室外座位。在忙碌都市裡，可供休憩、聊天的去處。
EN: Clean, neat and hygienic, the boss is very kind.The product is diversified, coffee, wine, and tea are great, cheap and CP value is high.It also offers simple meals and outdoor seats.In a busy city, you can go to rest and chat.

Original: 老闆和闆娘非常熱情親切，是一個讓人放鬆的地方，氣氛好、餐點CP值高、調酒也好讚，下次還要繼續約朋友來坐坐！！
EN: The boss and Ban Niang are very enthusiastic and kind. It is a relaxed place. The atmosphere is good, the CP value of the meal is high, and the bartender is also good. I will continue to ask friends to sit next time!Intersection

Original:
酒師傅有專利的蒸餾酒機器，可以接受委託生產各類台灣農作物的酒，例如牛蒡酒，日本人非常愛，還有香菇酒，咖啡酒，黑豆酒，枸杞酒，五穀酒…等等，養身又健康，在我喝酒30年以上的經驗裡，是非常難得的經驗。

樓下還有小型聚會的場地可供租借。
EN:
The wine master has patented distilled wine machines that can accept wines that commission various types of Taiwanese crops, such as beef wine, Japanese people love them very much, as well as shiitake wine, coffee wine, black bean wine, wolfberry wine, grain wine, etc. He is healthy and has a very rare experience in my experience of drinking for more than 30 years.

There are also small gatherings downstairs to rent.
